result.eng: Who left the large pack of magazines here?
result.ga: Cé a d'fhág an beart mór irisí anseo
result.orig: Cé a d'fhág an beart mór irisí anseo
result.html: Cé a d'fhág an beart mór irisí anseoWho left the large pack of magazines here?
result.ponchtml: Cé a d'ḟág an beart mór irisí anseoWho left the large pack of magazines here?

result.eng: The plan could be finished in six years.
result.ga: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.orig: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.html: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéadfaḋ an beart a ḃeiṫ críoċnaiṫe faoi ċeann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.

result.eng: We did as we said we would.
result.ga: Rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.orig: Rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.html: Rinne muid beart de réir briathairWe did as we said we would.
result.ponchtml: Rinne muid beart de réir briaṫairWe did as we said we would.

result.eng: We got a package in the post.
result.html: Tháinig beart sa phostWe got a package in the post.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig beart sa ṗostWe got a package in the post.
